name: Milk Guy
description:
GitHub link: https://github.com/hj2118/MilkGuy

This is a 2D platformer game created via Game Maker Studio 2.

A milk guy wants to become a chocolate milk. You do not want any other stuffs, so avoid bananas, fires, and raindrop and eat the chocolate bar in each level. Marshmallows are for bonus points (you definitely want marshmallows in your chocolate milk)!

There are total of 10 levels. If you would like to skip a level, press Enter key. (You get 100 points off each time!!)

Controls:
A and D: move
S: boost downward to hit ground
Space bar: jump (can double jump)

Credit:
Design of player character, fire, platforms, and background were provided by Professor Blake Andrews.
